author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains several finalisation changes for PPS proton reconstruction before the UL re-reco:
  * c5c4e47: removes the hardcoded IOV as promised in #25495
  * ff4097a: switches to CondDB as the default source of LHCInfo and optical functions.

Currently (9 April 2019), this PR cannot be tested and likely should be put on hold before pre-conditions are met:
  * LHCInfo available from CondDB: @ggovi informed us (8 April) that the upload is ongoing
  * optical functions are available from CondDB: #26350 needs to be merged first, @wpcarvalho has already prepared a sqlite file (successfully tested).

We inform you once this PR is tested and ready for review.

#### PR validation:

To be done.
title: PPS: proton reco finalisation before UL re-reco
